data.title: Who among the following was the first Assamese actress to win
data.meta_description: Who among the following was the first Assamese actress to win the Best Actress Award in the National Film Awards? a) Mridula Barua b) Dr. Santana Bordoloi c) Moloya Goswami d) None of the above
data.text:
Who among the following was the first Assamese actress to win the Best Actress Award in the National Film Awards?

A. Mridula Barua

B. Dr. Santana Bordoloi

C. Moloya Goswami

D. None of the above

Answer: Option C
